name: The Last On It (DEMO)
description:
-The Last On It-

DEMO: You are able to test one minigame called ("Fall Tiles").Which consists of trying not to fall while some flying objects try to knock down the towers in which you are standing (Inspired by the game mode of Halo 3 "JENGA").

CONTROLS:
W, A. S, D --- MOVE
SHIFT --- RUN  

SPACE --- JUMP
